title: iduvE turavaramE
sahitya:
iduvE turavaramE manamE Ishan AlayamAna kAsi idannilE


anupallavi

  idaya shAntiyuDanE iruvinaip-paTRinrip-podu nalam shei paripUraNan pUjaiyAi


caraNam    kASAya vESamum kamaNDalp-piccaiyum kADu malai vAsamum kavalaiyai nIkkumO
ASADabhUtikkumanbu nilai varumO ANDi maTham pughundAl ahambhAvam pOghumO
arinda amaidiyuDan nirainda sadaiyuDan aram tazhaikka paNi shei siranda karuttuDanE
